title: Joins and By
content:
INNER: Returns all rows when there is at least one match in BOTH tables SELECT column_names(s) FROM orders a INNER JOIN customers g ON g. orders.CustomerID=a Customers.CunstomerID; 
LEFT: Returns all rows from the left table, and the match rows from the right table.
Order by- sorts the results by ascending or descending
Group by- group the results by one or more columns
